content.body: the scheduling this year is done in half-days ‚Äî 4 hour sessions rather than 8 hours or whatever it normally is ‚Äî I guess in order to accommodate it being a ‚Äúhybrid‚Äù thing where we expect many participants will be taking part remotely (and experience shows it‚Äôs impractical to expect hybrid meetings to actually work effectively if they are any longer than 4 hours or so max)
